name: The Night Harvest
description:
My entry to the Ludum Dare 52 Jam, made in 72 hours over a weekend (jam entry page)

The night falls and the harvest starts. Can you overcome your hunger and survive for four nights?

Credits

I've used some music from opengameart.org:  

Gone Fishin' (by Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio)

Dark Forest Theme (by The Cynic Project)

Blueberries (by Viktor Kraus)

I've used the following sound effect from freesound.org:  

Chomp on Chip.wav (by bbrocer)

All graphical assets were created by me using Gimp / Aseprite.

The game was created using Unity.

Walkthrough Video
